name: Delicious Fricassee de Poulet
desc: A well-known Fontainian meat dish. The romantic rendezvous of cream and chicken instantly catalyzes a deep, rich aroma that lifts the spirits. It is said to be a favorite amongst Fontainians... One could feast on this fare for a lifetime and not fatigue of its fantastic flavor.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Fricassee de Poulet
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fricassee de Poulet.

customize.name: Fricassee de Poulet
customize.desc: A well-known Fontainian meat dish. The meat is first fried in oil until the skin is a delicious crispy brown, then stir-fried with onions and other condiments, before adding fermented fruit juice and stewing — and don't forget to add cream once the soup thickens. When ready, every last piece of meat is wrapped uniformly in cream, giving it that warm, familiar flavor that Fontainians love.

customize.name: Suspicious Fricassee de Poulet
customize.desc: A well-known Fontainian meat dish. Something is off about this — you knew that the moment it entered your mouth. The smooth cream has no hope of saving the bone-dry, yellowed, ever-so-slightly bitter meat, so much so that your previously ravenous appetite has long fled with its tail between its legs.

customize.name: Delicious Fricassee de Poulet
customize.desc: A well-known Fontainian meat dish. The romantic rendezvous of cream and chicken instantly catalyzes a deep, rich aroma that lifts the spirits. It is said to be a favorite amongst Fontainians... One could feast on this fare for a lifetime and not fatigue of its fantastic flavor.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Fermented Juice
customize.desc: A fermented juice with a unique fruity scent. It is often used as a marinade.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Cream
customize.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.
